#Text= Mako says : " We have to get in there and find some evidence that links Aiwei to Zaheer , otherwise Su wo n't believe us .

column1: #Text=" Asami says : " It 's just an empty book .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hmm , it 's like a desert on a jar .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , put that back !
#Text=We do n't want Aiwei to know we were in here if we ca n't find anything .
#Text=You forgot where it goes , did n't you ?
#Text=These look like scuff marks .
#Text=I think this bookshelf slides open .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you think is down there ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Could be a storage cellar .
#Text=" Mako says : " Or it could be how Zaheer got in and out .
#Text=" Asami says : " Aiwei 's coming back !
#Text=Quick .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " What are doing in my house ?
#Text=You are trespassing on the property of one of the highest - ranked officials in the city .
#Text=You 'd better have a good explanation .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We do .
#Text=We do .
#Text=We actually knocked on your front door and we thought we heard you say , ' Come in , I 'm in the bathroom ! '
#Text=I do n't even know why I 'm saying that .
#Text=You know I 'm lying , and you do n't even sound like that .
#Text=" Korra says : " We came here because things were n't adding up , and we thought you might have some answers .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Sit .
#Text=If you want to talk , let 's talk over some tea .
#Text=Now , what is not adding up exactly ?
#Text=Hong Li was clearly lying and we found evidence in his apartment .
#Text=" Mako says : " But do n't you think it 's weird how young he is ?
#Text=How did he ever get mixed up with this group ?
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Perhaps through a relative , or maybe he was bribed .
#Text=We will find out those answers in time .
#Text=But if was n't him , who do you think it was ?
#Text=" Asami says : " We do n't know .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " You do n't think I had something to do with this , do you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're just looking for answers .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " And you think you 've found something , do n't you ?
#Text=You have no idea what is coming for you , Avatar .
#Text=" Mako says : " Come on , he 's getting away !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm still a little new at this , so back off !
#Text=Ugh !
#Text=" Mako says : " He 's gone .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , he must 've escaped through there !
#Text=Help me clear it out .
#Text=" Lin says : " What happened ?
#Text=We heard an explosion .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Where 's Aiwei ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Your trusted adviser is the one who betrayed us .
#Text=He was lying about the guard .
#Text=" Suyin says : " What ?
#Text=No !
#Text=" Korra says : " We confronted him and he bolted through here .
#Text=" Lin says : " He must have collapsed the tunnel behind him .
#Text=" Mako says : " And he rigged an explosion to destroy any evidence that might have been here .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is where Zaheer got in and out .
#Text=Aiwei was the traitor .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I ... trusted him .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Is everyone okay ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Aiwei is a fugitive .
#Text=Get all available guards to search the mountainside , and find out where this tunnel exits immediately !
#Text=" Lin says : " What did you find ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " We located the end of the tunnel , but there 's no sign of him .
#Text=Just some fresh tire tracks .
#Text=" Mako says : " He had an escape plan all ready to go .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I trusted him with my life .
#Text=I thought we were family , but it was all a lie .
#Text=" Mako says : " Whoever these guys are , they 're more powerful than we thought , and more dangerous .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's why we have to find them .
#Text=We 're going to hold off our search for airbenders and hunt down Aiwei .
#Text=Naga can track his scent .
#Text=" Asami says : " And I bet if we find Aiwei , we 'll find Zaheer .
#Text=" Lin says : " No !
#Text=We 're not hunting this group .
#Text=There could be other secret agents in other parts of the world looking for you right now !
#Text=I 'm taking you back to Republic City , where I can protect you .
#Text=" Korra says : " If I was n't safe here , then I 'm not safe anywhere .
#Text=I have to stop them !
#Text=" Lin says : " It 's too dangerous !
#Text=You are not going !
#Text=" Korra says : " Stop trying to protect me !
#Text=I 'm the Avatar .
#Text=This is my job !
#Text=" Lin says : " Do n't lecture me about jobs !
#Text=" Suyin says : " Enough !
#Text=Korra , listen to Lin .
#Text=" Korra says : " But ... they ... " Suyin says : " Please .
#Text=Lin 's only looking out for you .
#Text=I promise you , Aiwei and everyone he 's working with will be brought to justice .
#Text=" Korra says : " Fine , if you really think it 's best .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I do .
#Text=" Lin says : " Thank you , Su .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Everyone should get some rest tonight .
#Text=I 'll have my people prep your airship and you can leave first thing in the morning .
#Text="
